description: S2: Social Cue with Moving Trucks - Occlusion-Aware Controller
scenario: Moving firetrucks brake for pedestrian, ego follows

scenario_config.notes: 24 km/h = 6.67 m/s, aware controller responds to both occlusion and social cue

events.description: Moving firetrucks create occlusion - aware slows proactively
truck_front brakes - aware controller responds immediately
Pedestrian revealed - ego already at reduced speed
